name: Object N
description:
«‎Object N»‎ is the classic dynamic shooter. The setting moves us to the Cold War. You are a special Soviet unit who was sent to the secret government object named "N". After an unknown disaster, unknown troops occupied a secret underground science center. Your task is to prevent any information leakage and clear out the evidence.

Single-player:
You need to get to the end of the level while destroying opponents with firearms. There are about ten different single-player levels: tunnels, technical floor, train, labs, cliff. Some of them may contain puzzles, secrets and other types of interaction. The following types of weapons are available to the player: knife, pistol, shotgun, assault rifle, sniper rifle, and grenades. The game features various opponents, against which you will need certain tactics.

Multiplayer modes:
  • Cooperative - Beat campaign maps with other players.
  • Deathmatch / Team deathmatch - Classic class based combat. In this mode, players need to fight each other. Game ends when the player or team reaches the required number of frags.
  • Demolition - Bomb plant scenario. The red team should attack and destroy one of the strategic points, while another team defends these points.
  • Hide 'N Seek Deathmatch - Seekers trying to catch runners on parkour based maps. After the seeker kills the runner, the seeker and the runner change their roles.
  • KreeDz - parkour or jumping maps. Your goal is to reach the end before your opponents.

Player classes:
  • Rifleman has an assault rifle, pistol, knife and a grenade.
  • Breacher has a shotgun, pistol, knife and three grenades.
  • Marksman has a sniper rifle, pistol, knife, two grenades.
  • Engineer has only a pistol and a knife, but has an ability to create barricades.
  • Assassin is a powerful melee unit. He can fly using his hook and has no fall damage.
